content: turkey applique pattern by allyson morse my crazy cat crochet mycrazycatcrochet on etsy allyson morse on ravelry @mycrazycatcrochet on instagram this pattern is for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed resold translated published altered shared posted for sale or free at all you can sell items made from this pattern but please credit me allyson morse @mycrazycatcrochet / #mycrazycatcrochet on instagram with finished item 1 what you will need yarn red orange yellow brown hook size to match yarn weight stitch marker poly-fil for stuffing scissors yarn needle safety eyes abbreviations magic_ring ~ magic_ring chain ~ chain single_crochet ~ single_crochet double_crochet ~ double_crochet half_double_crochet ~ half_double_crochet picot ~ picot stitch link provided crab stitch link provided slip_stitch ~ slip_stitch increase ~ increase decrease ~ decrease repeat ~ repeat round ~ round skip ~ skip f/o ~ fasten_off notes 1 this pattern is worked in continuous rounds & us terms 2 i use the yarn over technique using a different way may throw sts off 3 i use the invisible decrease technique 4 i used i love this yarn in all colors 5 i used a size g hook 6 i used 10mm eyes feathers feather #1 red https //youtu be/b25jdssdy-y link for picot stitch 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 2 increase repeat 12 3 single_crochet increase repeat 18 4 2 single_crochet increase repeat 24 5 3 single_crochet increase repeat 30 6 4 single_crochet increase repeat 36 7 5 single_crochet increase repeat 42 8 6 single_crochet increase repeat 48 9 7 single_crochet increase repeat 54 2 10 *all in one stitch 2 double_crochet picot chain 1 2 double_crochet skip 1 single_crochet sk1* repeat * to * until you have 11 points f/o hide end feather #2 orange https //youtu be/b25jdssdy-y link for picot stitch 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 2 increase repeat 12 3 single_crochet increase repeat 18 4 2 single_crochet increase repeat 24 5 3 single_crochet increase repeat 30 6 4 single_crochet increase repeat 36 7 5 single_crochet increase repeat 42 8 6 single_crochet increase repeat 48 9 *all in one stitch 2 double_crochet picot chain 1 2 double_crochet skip 1 single_crochet sk1* repeat * to * until you have 9 points f/o leave a long tail for sewing 3 feather #3 yellow https //youtu be/b25jdssdy-y link for picot stitch 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 2 increase repeat 12 3 single_crochet increase repeat 18 4 2 single_crochet increase repeat 24 5 3 single_crochet increase repeat 30 6 4 single_crochet increase repeat 36 7 5 single_crochet increase repeat 42 8 *all in one stitch 2 double_crochet picot chain 1 2 double_crochet skip 1 single_crochet sk1* repeat * to * until you have 7 points f/o leave a long tail for sewing body brown https //youtu be/k7xokueiknm link for crab stitch 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 2 increase repeat 12 3 single_crochet increase repeat 18 4 2 single_crochet increase repeat 24 5
